programme.title: Presidential infidelities impeachment
programme.short_synopsis: The modest history of presidential infidelity and how the impeachment process works.
programme.medium_synopsis: Misconceptions over the frequency of Presidential infidelities, recalling a time when the press never discussed a statesman's private life, and the impeachment process explained.
